title: PC-9801/PC-9821 Game Collection
description:
This contains a large collection of NEC PC-9801 and PC-9821 games that can be found on various Japanese P2P networks.
It's now available in torrent form for ease of access by the western gaming community.

This is arguably one of the most extensive collection of PC-9801 games to date.
It contains 3989 zipped files. Some games have more than one zip file due to being available in multiple formats.
This pack does not contain any CD-ROM games. Only floppy-based games.

More roms for various Japanese machines will be posted as I get them.
